title: Adithya Institute of Technology - [AIT], Coimbatore - Admissions, Contact, Website, Facilities 2024-2025
meta_description: Adithya Institute of Technology - [AIT], Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, B.Tech, MBA, BE . 18 Courses. Average Fees is 55000 per year.

Section.name: About AIT
Section.description:
Adithya Institute of Technology (AIT), Coimbatore was established in 2008 under Adithya Educational Trust. It is affiliated to Anna University, Coimbatore and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. The vision of the institute is to create engineers and managers with the necessary skills and values for their career and life. The mission of the institute is to transform students through a systematic teaching-learning process, providing skill development training, practical exposure and imparting values of life during their period of study. The college is located at Sathy Main Road in Kurumbapalayam SSKulam, Coimbatore. It is 12 km away from Coimbatore City and nine kilometers away from Coimbatore Civil Aerodrome

Facilities
Classrooms
The institute has well furnished and spacious classrooms.
Computer Lab
The computer lab is well equipped with latest software and configurations.
Library
The institute has a wifi enabled library with a collection of over 16530 volumes of books, 150 printed periodicals, 1200 digital versions and 1150 audio-visual CD’s.
Hostel
Available for both boys and girls student separately.
